page.title: 08SHOPPING PAGE 1
page.content: We have been studying the shopping habits of the people whose children go to Tattingstone School.We think they are probably typical of the population of the area we are studying.We sent out a questionnaire and intreviewed the shopkeeper. Tattingstone and the area of Wherstead covered in this study have only one general store and post office combined.This shop is in the main village street called Church Street and is opposite the village primary school. It is owned by Mr Lee.Most people in Tattingstone and Wherstead use Mr Lee's shop.The shop is open from 8.30-5.30 and closes for an hour at lunch time. The busiest time of day is at 3.20 when the school finishes.The shop is not open on Sundays or Bank holidays.Mr Lee and his wife work in the shop. (contd)
